alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 9:04PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Lena. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Significant flooding of pastureland and agricultural land is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 22.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 28.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Pearl River Lena 24.0 22.3 Wed 8 pm CDT 26.1 27.5 27.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 915 AM CDT.
